index.presentation: Full Stack Developer based in Entre Rios, Argentina.
about.title: About me
about.h2: Hi there! Let me introduce myself...
about.p1: I am a Full Stack Developer, constantly learning to be able to perform a higher quality result in each job. I like to experiment and learn about new technologies, programming languages, operating systems and new tools. I think I can adapt easily. I have a preference for the backend, although I like the frontend a lot too. I am interested in blockchain, web3, cryptography and cybersecurity, in which I plan to train for it in the near future
about.p2: Thank you for taking the time to read about me.

projects.henryGames.description: Small application to search and create game information, filter by name, rating, genre and origin. For more information, check the repository.
projects.rgbTech.description: E-commerce of technological products, focused on technology fans and gamers. It has an administrator panel, user database, access with Google and much more. For more information, check the repository.
